verses.verse: Behold, ((Gen. 3:17, 19)) children are a heritage from the LORD, ((Gen. 33:5; Josh. 24:3, 4; Ps. 113:9)) The fruit of the womb is a (Deut. 7:13; 28:4; Is. 13:18) reward.
Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, So are the children of oneâ€™s youth.
((Ps. 113:9)) Happy is the man who has his quiver full of them; (Ps. 128:2, 3) They shall not be ashamed, But shall speak with their enemies in the gate.
Blessings of Those Who Fear the LORD A Song of Ascents. [1] Blessed (Job 5:4; Prov. 27:11) is every one who fears the LORD, Who walks in His ways.
(Ps. 119:1) When you eat the labor of your hands, You shall be happy, and it shall be (Is. 3:10) well with you.
Your wife shall be (Deut. 4:40) like a fruitful vine In the very heart of your house, Your (Ezek. 19:10) children (Ps. 127:3-5) like olive plants All around your table.
Behold, thus shall the man be blessed Who fears the LORD.
(Ps. 52:8; 144:12) The LORD bless you out of Zion, And may you see the good of Jerusalem All the days of your life.
